about_the_game:
RockOUT is a climbing game where you go only up. In a world where digital and reality have merged, you find yourself fused with a rock. With no hammer, no hopper, and no freedom of movement, you must rely only up on the power of your head to jump and climb through a bizarre landscape towards a world-ending threat. It's a battle against gravity and impending doom!

Every mistake sends you falling all the way back to the starting location—a true test of your precision and timing. It demands speed and strategic tactics to overcome the increasingly difficult obstacles in your path. Don’t be humiliated by repeated falls; each attempt is a chance to refine your controls.

Early Gameplay Streamer Bonus! Get your name featured as "Special Thanks" in the end credits! Limited to the first 3 streamers per country!
* If you would like to be featured, please contact us with the URL of your gameplay video via X (formerly Twitter) or email (chronotope.app+support@gmail.com).

* The end credits will be shown upon clearing Normal or Hard mode.

Playtime: 20 - 120 minutes

Streaming: No specific restrictions.

Game Modes: Easy (with checkpoints), Normal (with checkpoints), Hard (no checkpoints)

Use your head! But not for thinking.

Harness the power of your mind—but not for deep contemplation.

In this peculiar world where the digital blends seamlessly with the real, you find yourself transformed, fused with unyielding rock. With determination and your "head" as your sole tool, take on the climb to reach new heights. The graphics create a visually striking world, optimized for smooth performance (optimisation) even on lower-end systems.

Balanced controls are essential for this Only Up experience. Every jump requires accuracy, and every landing demands precision. Mistakes may send you back to the beginning, but every setback holds an opportunity to grow and become the hero the world needs.

For in your journey lies a singular, noble purpose: to defeat a colossal meteor on a path to Earth’s destruction. Will you rise to the occasion, master your fears, and save the world?
detailed_description:
RockOUT is a climbing game where you go only up. In a world where digital and reality have merged, you find yourself fused with a rock. With no hammer, no hopper, and no freedom of movement, you must rely only up on the power of your head to jump and climb through a bizarre landscape towards a world-ending threat. It's a battle against gravity and impending doom!

Every mistake sends you falling all the way back to the starting location—a true test of your precision and timing. It demands speed and strategic tactics to overcome the increasingly difficult obstacles in your path. Don’t be humiliated by repeated falls; each attempt is a chance to refine your controls.

Early Gameplay Streamer Bonus! Get your name featured as "Special Thanks" in the end credits! Limited to the first 3 streamers per country!
* If you would like to be featured, please contact us with the URL of your gameplay video via X (formerly Twitter) or email (chronotope.app+support@gmail.com).

* The end credits will be shown upon clearing Normal or Hard mode.

Playtime: 20 - 120 minutes

Streaming: No specific restrictions.

Game Modes: Easy (with checkpoints), Normal (with checkpoints), Hard (no checkpoints)

Use your head! But not for thinking.

Harness the power of your mind—but not for deep contemplation.

In this peculiar world where the digital blends seamlessly with the real, you find yourself transformed, fused with unyielding rock. With determination and your "head" as your sole tool, take on the climb to reach new heights. The graphics create a visually striking world, optimized for smooth performance (optimisation) even on lower-end systems.

Balanced controls are essential for this Only Up experience. Every jump requires accuracy, and every landing demands precision. Mistakes may send you back to the beginning, but every setback holds an opportunity to grow and become the hero the world needs.

For in your journey lies a singular, noble purpose: to defeat a colossal meteor on a path to Earth’s destruction. Will you rise to the occasion, master your fears, and save the world?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS , Ubuntu 22.04+ or comparable
  • Processor: 2.5GHz Dual core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6 GB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 2.5GHz Dual core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6 GB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5GHz Dual core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6 GB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: RockOUT is a unique physics-based climbing game where you go Only Up! Fused with a rock, use only your head to jump and climb through challenging obstacles. One mistake sends you falling back to the start. Use tactics to defeat the incoming meteor in this unique world.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Indonesian, Ukrainian, Dutch, Greek, Swedish, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Czech, Danish, Turkish, Norwegian, Hungarian, Finnish, Bulgarian, Vietnamese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Icelandic, Irish, Azerbaijani, Assamese, Afrikaans, Amharic, Albanian, Armenian, Igbo, Uyghur, Welsh, Wolof, Uzbek, Urdu, Estonian, Odia, Kazakh, Catalan, Kannada, Galician, K'iche', Kyrgyz, Khmer, Croatian, Gujarati, Quechua, Xhosa, Konkani, Sindhi, Sinhala, Georgian, Scots, Slovak, Slovenian, Swahili, Zulu, Serbian, Sotho, Sorani, Tajik, Tatar, Tamil, Dari, Cherokee, Tswana, Tigrinya, Telugu, Turkmen, Nepali, Hausa, Basque, Valencian, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Hindi, Filipino, Hebrew, Belarusian, Bangla, Persian, Bosnian, Maori, Macedonian, Malayalam, Marathi, Maltese, Malay, Mongolian, Yoruba, Latvian, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Kinyarwanda
